Document

Use the document component to add a link to a file that the user can preview in a browser or can download. Edit the icon type to display the corresponding file type.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-document

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-document

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-document/src/scss/document";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Document

Implementation of a basis document. Click on the document title to display or download the linked file.

PDF
Hubert en Jan van Eyck, Vlaamse Primitieven
PDF - 580 kB
 
      <div class="vl-col--1-4 vl-col--1-2--m vl-col--1-1--s">
    <a class="vl-document" href="#">
      <div class="vl-document__type">
        <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-document" aria-hidden="true"></i>
        <span class="vl-document__type__text">PDF</span>
      </div>
      <div class="vl-document__content">
          <div class="vl-document__title vl-link" data-vl-clamp="2">Hubert en Jan van Eyck, Vlaamse Primitieven</div>
        <div class="vl-document__metadata">PDF - 580 kB</div>
      </div>
    </a>
  </div>

Document external

After a click on the document title a new browser tab will open and display or download the linked file.

PDF
Hubert en Jan van Eyck, Vlaamse Primitieven (externe link)
PDF - 580 kB
 
      <div class="vl-col--1-4 vl-col--1-2--m vl-col--1-1--s">
    <a class="vl-document" href="#" target="_blank">
      <div class="vl-document__type">
        <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-document" aria-hidden="true"></i>
        <span class="vl-document__type__text">PDF</span>
      </div>
      <div class="vl-document__content">
          <div class="vl-document__title vl-link">
            <span data-vl-clamp="2">Hubert en Jan van Eyck, Vlaamse Primitieven</span>
            <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden"> (externe link)</span>
            <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--after vl-link__icon--light vl-vi vl-vi-external" aria-hidden="true"></i>
          </div>
        <div class="vl-document__metadata">PDF - 580 kB</div>
      </div>
    </a>
  </div>
